summary: Adds a new jewlerly building that offers players a respawnable place to break in and steal expensive things. with unique jewelry
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia]This mods adds the new structure in Windhelm,Gray Quarters.The jewelry shop Almalexia.
[/font][font=Georgia]Inside is a lot of jewelry at display,one security guard,and an owner.
[/font][font=Georgia]Primary this mod adds an expensive Jewelry Store in Windhelm.[/font][font=Georgia]
[/font][font=Georgia]
The Secundary intention is to organize a theft of all valuables.Besides the jewelry at display,there is also safe (in bedroom upstairs),and[/font][font=Georgia]strongbox which is thought to be cashier.[/font][font=Georgia]
[/font][font=Georgia]
All cases restart after certain time so you can repeat theft.[/font][font=Georgia]
[/font][font=Georgia]
All jewelry is unique including circlets,thou the difference is not great,I wanted it to keep lore friendly.[/font][font=Georgia]
[/font]
[font=Georgia]The sewers are unique interrior and last point of this mod is to clear the sewers since there is an rogue necromancer[b].[/b][/font]
[font=Georgia]
[spoiler] Beside the main entrance,there is also an entrance through roof (which must be entered from Atheron Residence)[/font]
[font=Georgia]and through sewers,which you can enter underneath the bridge,but you must aquaire the key which is in Palace of the Kings.[/font]
[font=Georgia]in a key holder in one of the rooms. 
There is also the option to pickpocket the owner,and that way to unlock all the cases with jewelry[/spoiler][/font]

[font=Georgia]Enjoy :)

[/font][b]Version 1.6 - [/b][size=4]introduced 15 new jewelry pcs derived from[/size][size=3] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8361]Expanded Jewlery Crafting[/url]﻿[/size][b]
[/b]

[b][color=#999999][font=Arial][size=3][i]All credits for their amazing work which you can see in this mod :[/i][/size][/font][/color][/b]
[font=Georgia][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43143/]FPI Research[/url] for display cases[/font]
[font=Georgia][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/867382]Darkirder[/url] for paintings[/font]
[font=Georgia][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4522213]Saeri[/url] for jewelry[/font]
[font=Georgia][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2235573]Oaristys[/url] for safe and candle holder[/font]
[font=Georgia]Elianora for floor[/font]
[font=Georgia][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10258480]Lor[/url] for floor[/font]
[font=Georgia]T67 for planters[/font]
[font=Georgia][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/12772468]Nickorasu[/url] for glass work above front door[/font]
[font=Georgia][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/258945]Insanity[/url] for clutter
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27064]ZZjay[/url]﻿ for circlets
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8361]Lautasantenni[/url] for elven and ebony jewelry[/font]
author: ibrica_orahovac
